statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ 5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ -3 \\ 6 \\ 11 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -6 \\ -3 \\ 5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -1 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ -3 \\ 6 \\ 11 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
